file_content.text: Are my fingers meant to be this color?
Jedi! We've been waiting for you.
Do us proud out there, Jedi!
We wanted to thank you before we left. We owe you our lives... and I probably owe you my career.
We wanted to say thanks before we left. We'd never have made it through without your help!
You even put Valon on a leash. That's Jedi training for you!
I just did what was best for everyone.
It was nothing, really.
After what Valon did to you and your homeworlds, it's fitting to make him serve you.
It seemed appropriate.
Valon sought destruction and enslavement. Now he's found it.
He deserved this.
It was worth it all to see Valon stuffed in a convict shuttle.
Here. From us. Don't need our equipment now that we're leaving.
It was an honor to work alongside you. Go well.
Look after yourselves.
Thank you.
Is this all you can spare? I did save your lives, after all....
That's it?
We'd love to give you twice as much, but we used all our gear fighting Valon.
Oh, forgot. The LT got a call, he's gone up to your starship to make a report. He said he'd meet you there.
The LT got called up to your starship to make his report. He said to meet you up there.
Whatever anyone says, you're one of us now, Jedi. Best of luck.
